product_name: HYS 3.5mm Police Listen Only Acoustic Tube Earpiece with One Pair Medium Earmolds for Speaker Mics
explanation: Cradle-to-gate emissions for the HYS 3.5mm Police Listen Only Acoustic Tube Earpiece were estimated based on material composition, transportation of raw materials, and manufacturing processes. The product weighs approximately 0.018 kg, with a material breakdown into silicone, copper, plastic, rubber, other metals, and electronics components. Emissions from raw material extraction and processing were calculated using average emission factors for each material. Transportation emissions were estimated assuming a 500 km distance to the manufacturing facility. Manufacturing emissions were approximated using an average factor for electronics manufacturing.
